nodes.text: The Alagon system was a star system located within the Mid Rim of the galaxy.

The Xeran Mining Corporation ran a mining operation in the system and initially employed sentient workers, who were ultimately fired and replaced with HND-9 mining droids. The former miners created the Worker's Militia and staged an uprising against the corporation, attacking starships that attempted to leave the system. Eventually, the New Republic intervened and ended the conflict.
